review_title: Alright but not as good as expected.
pros: It's a big name in the agri-development consulting
cons: Extreme cases of workplace incivility, can bog down one morally. Won't recommend anyone to be a part of this culture. They do nothing if you create a grievance to that with concrete evidence. It's because the entire structure of the organization is that way.
